other_tests.findings: Diagnosis of adenocarcinoma with a Gleason score of 6, cancer involved 80% of a single core from the right base region of the prostate.
Final pathology confirmed the presence of organ-confined prostate cancer with negative surgical margins, pelvic lymph nodes, and seminal vesicles.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Erectile function lost for approximately 9 months but by 9 months and 16 days post-surgery, he could achieve erections on his own.
Initial score was 25 at the first consultation, with a decrease in score noted following the surgery until recovery of function.
